title: POLL: Would You Rather Be Skilled In CSing or Getting Kills
body:
A: Be able to hit 10+ cs/m every game by playing safe and last hitting every minion while getting jungler camps, scuttles etc but have little to no kills/deaths.

or 

B: Be able to get about 1 kill or assist a minute but about 6 or less cs/m and about 5+ deaths.

(Supports and junglers dont count for obvious reasons)
